FuncDef: This command modifies the size of the mid-pool when calculating the port-class pool sizes based on port bandwidth ratios. The command does not actually change the size of the mid-pool, only the size reported to the port-class pool sizing function.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the factor by which the dynamically-sized port-class pools associated with the mid-pool may oversubscribe the mid-pool. This parameter is required when the port-bw-oversub-factor command is executed. Values-1 to 10.
